name: FindHousesByVehicles
documentation: Satisfied if given vehicle gets inside the given radius around the given house.

parameters.name: VehicleId
parameters.documentation: The ObjectId of the vehicle that needs to approach the house.

parameters.name: HouseId
parameters.documentation: The ObjectId of the house the vehicle needs to approach.

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.documentation: The radius around the house the vehicle has to be in to satisfy the goal.
